TraitDef.label: cannibal
TraitDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taught that consuming humanlike flesh is a sacred act that absorbs the strength and essence of enemies. [PAWN_pronoun] gains mood bonuses from butchering humanlike corpses and eating humanlike meat, but suffers penalties when forced to eat plant matter.

TraitDef.label: moustache ritualist
TraitDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is deeply devoted to the sacred moustache grooming rituals of the Zhul. [PAWN_pronoun] gains significant mood bonuses from proper grooming but becomes distressed without access to ritual oils and implements.
